amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup by $4 million and reduces funding for the Salaries and Expenses of the Department of Energy by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds for the Non-Defense Environmental Cleanup by $4 million and reduce funds for the Salaries and Expenses of the Department of Energy by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Reed.
